textBox.richText: This was also alluded to previously with the initial hack that showed it was possible. The process for hacking fifth gen is very similar to fourth, at least as far as text is concerned. Fortunately text hacking is teh bestest. These games have still yet to come out in america, so once they do we’ll see what the community does as far as scripts and the like. Most of this video was composed using pptxt, by SCV. It’s a very limited, but effective text editor. You can try this out yourself with the fifth gen download on the downloads page. The text .narcs for black and white are in a/0/0/2 and a/0/0/3. (2 contains elements like items and the intro while 3 continues much of the main story).
